title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added Copilot Chat model management documentation in changelog.
Consolidated cost center limitations in concepts file (max 250 centers, 10k resources, 50 ops/batch, Azure UI-only).
Clarified dormant user activity: pushes now specify internal repos, added exclusions for token/SSH/app access and private repo Git ops.
Updated GraphQL schema: added `EXEMPT` enum to `RepositoryRulesetBypassActorBypassMode`, fixed `Discussion.author` description.
summary:

- Clarified dormant user activity: pushes now specify internal repos, added exclusions for token/SSH/app access and private repo Git ops.
- Updated GraphQL schema: added `EXEMPT` enum to `RepositoryRulesetBypassActorBypassMode`, fixed `Discussion.author` description.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.

- Added Copilot Chat model management documentation in changelog.
- Consolidated cost center limitations in concepts file (max 250 centers, 10k resources, 50 ops/batch, Azure UI-only).
- Clarified dormant user activity: pushes now specify internal repos, added exclusions for token/SSH/app access and private repo Git ops.
- Updated GraphQL schema: added `EXEMPT` enum to `RepositoryRulesetBypassActorBypassMode`, fixed `Discussion.author` description.
